page.title: 07 VILLAGE MAGAZINE
page.content: The local village{magazine}is called {Grapevine.}Here are some extracts from the{July 1985 edition.} {Orleton Village Fete}on Saturday July 8th raised the staggering amount of Â£700. There were lots of stalls like plant stalls, sweets, cakes, W.I., produce, tombola, books, lucky dip and a draw. Little Hereford hold their fete on Saturday August 10th. {Orleton W.I. A visit to Lower Hundred Craft Workshop at Kimbolton was the event for the June meeting. During the business meeting the President, Mrs Pattern reported that the coffee morning at Mrs Peoli's home on May 22nd had made Â£50. She thanked all those people that had worked so hard to make it a success.
